text: Apo takave tinozadzisa rufu rwake (Sulaimaan (Soromoni)), hapana chakavaudza (maJinn) nezverufu rwake kunze kwegore duku repasi iro rairamba (zvishoma nezvishoma) richidya tsvimbo yake. Saka apo akadonha, Majinn akanyatsoona kuti dai vaiva vaziva zvisingaoneki, vaiva vasingagari mumarwadzo anonyadzisa
